Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Medisign and Smart Diabetes blood glucose monitoring systems with Bluetooth technology for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm for diabetes management; single patient systems for self-testing and multi-patient systems for use by healthcare professionals; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
